name: Visit Caco-chan
description:
WASD to move

Q and E to rotate the camera

space to wait

0 (zero) to die

Time only advances when you move.

Reach your caco gf in as few turns as possible...

Meant for Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "stuck in a loop"

Written from scratch in 23 hours. Ran out of time before I could make it fun.
